tweets.text: The art was created by the writer, their title is contributing writer, and midjourney gives you ownership of works you create, so I would assume The Atlantic (or at least @cwarzel) do have exclusive rights ‚Äì I would rather have this than hastily-found Getty images on every story https://t.co/vHyBmZHdN2 https://t.co/wUzlpHBrlW
lmao annoyed by neighbors working on their motorcycles ü§ì https://t.co/S1eIJnUI8V

my ego is often repeating "you didn't do anything today!" when the truth is, in fact, I didn't *complete* anything today, and the fact about doing big work is that you often don't finish it in a single day, and this is a struggle for me
I also like the occasional moon waxing / waning effect it gets when white circles overlap with black ones. https://t.co/l37DsTcVJr
Overlapping and offset grids create the illusion of shapes, tricks the mind into making nothing into something. https://t.co/MpwFpSHWuS

There is something really special and interesting about the ways these grids of circles interact, and especially fun to give up so much control to randomness and still get things that feel "designed". https://t.co/qJFvKT99Ir

Anyway I love it because it is so simple and yet so complicated in an emergent way. It's kind of an abstract visualization of interacting systems, which is interesting to me in variety of ways. So this morning I made an Observable Sketch inspired by it. https://t.co/vXiBlIofly

I've spent the last 3 days or so staring at this incredible image that I found stumbling around https://t.co/77c24W8zC4 - spent like 30 minutes this morning trying to find the original author / source but couldn't find it (tips appreciated!) https://t.co/k6l2C8EIga
Anyone have good recommendations for the best 2020 Swift / iOS development course?
I also think a MTP without Chuck Todd would be better in nearly every way https://t.co/HWTQOOAPKP https://t.co/HiScxtCxVV
Now @enjalot is writing godly BigQuery SQL queries https://t.co/Re8vERiJnX

Currently exploring some BigQuery geospatial analysis of internet speeds by school district to work towards @jeremiak‚Äôs question: how many school districts in the US have internet infrastructure to support remote learning
Hanging out with @jeremiak talking through some datasets we might play with (also peep our new progress bar!) https://t.co/CYrInACZ3c
Live now! https://t.co/NBqQqSlzox

Going live with @enjalot in 30 minutes. We are gonna hang out, talk to the chat a bit, experiment with live coding some data viz, and celebrate our 10th stream! https://t.co/UjuUaUoRUi https://t.co/fb81QxkJeX
Next week someone remind me to do a 24 hour student level redesign of twitter at a base level

So into this book I found at the bookstore last night 

So far, big takeaway, its all about the roof-wall junctions https://t.co/YkfyP8WAa9
Activist shark tank where bandana-clad anarchists pitch their app ideas for social upheaval to the crypto-hackers for funding
For example, I anticipate the skill of being able to economically and pleasurably feed 100 of your closest friends going way way up in value in my lifetime

Which means that all of the skills I have acquired to capture and convey information truthfully have not really equipped me for the problems we face. In order to actually do anything requires recalibrating a bit.
People either already know, dont care to know, or simply dont care
Obviously that is hilarious

Can you believe I got into dataviz and journalism (and photography) because I thought if you showed people what was happening to the world clearly and rigorously and truthfully people would realize the problems we face

For my first ~25 years of life I was obsessed with ‚Äúhow‚Äù. How do I get there. How do I do that. 

I feel myself, perhaps, tilting differently over the past year or so into ‚Äúwhy‚Äù. Why was this made like this. Why are we seeing these effects. Why is isnt it different?
Cant wait until I see many more of you commit suicide rather than face the justice you know is coming, let this be the first of many
Anyway, all our enemies, the most evil people in the world will play golf and sit in air conditioning while they hold half of us in cages and pay the other half to argue about it- there is no justice
